description: DescriptionPosition DescriptionPosition Title:Retail Marketing ManagerReports To:E-Commerce ManagerEssential Position Responsibilities:As part of the Jimmy Jazz Brand offense, our team is looking for a Retail Marketing Manager to join our crew to help build the future of retail at Jimmy Jazz.In this role, the candidate will drive and lead the development of all-inclusive marketing plans for doors, from flow/initiative based retail brand elements to planning and executing offline to online (O2O) marketing strategies and tactics.The candidate should have a comprehensive grasp on the retail landscape, along with the ability to lead multiple tasks and build strong working relationships across the organization. Collaboration, brief development, project management, communication and creativity will be vital pieces of the role.The Retail Marketing Coordinator is responsible for leading the marketing team's initiatives a necessary logistical support. They will act as liaison between Digital Marketing, internal creative team, product, operations and visual teams and ensure consistent omni channel communication for all brand partnerships, seasonal campaigns and activations. The role will grow the overall marketing support, communication, production and efficiency.WHAT YOU WILL DODevelop, brief and lead retail brand plans including but not limited to: retail seasonal flow
